ygData.subject: New arrival
ygData.msgSnippet: The air was thick as toast around the landing sight where a ball of fire had fallen from the sky and scorched the land barren. Cinders still hung in the air as

From: "Ralph Ares" <ralph@...>

The air was thick as toast around the landing sight where a ball of fire had
fallen from the sky and scorched the land barren. Cinders still hung in the
air as the flam on a nearby branch crackled like the hands of a thousand
clocks whose voices were stolen by the winds of time. The world stood still
as a mound of ash quivered and opened on all sides to admit a solitary
figure entrance into the world of air and land that was Earth. As the figure
stood, its visibility became less and less opaque until it was completely
invisible, but the last image had it moving just south of the setting sun,
as the golden disk set over the mountains of the land which would one day be
known as Spain.
